channel.title: Crysis
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i87.photobucket.com/albums/k135/dh713/crysis.png[/img]
I tried some new stuff with smudging and clipping masks. I think it turned out alright though. So rate and comment.
o yea and the top right hand corner has like a clear spot because i erased a little bit and made a few more layers then realized that was there. Making it a pain in the ass to redo...

Yea I guess my screen is bright so It looks dark but still brightish…
